QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 1. The two divisions made in I Corinthians 15:44-49 are:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Milk and meat|B. Good and evil|C. Satan and demons|D. Natural and spiritual|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 2. The two invisible kingdoms in the world today are:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Communists and capitalists|B. Protestants and Catholics|C. Kingdoms of God and Satan|D. None of the above|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 3. The word "kingdom" means:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. A state|B. A territory over which a king reigns|C. A group|D. A political party|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 4. "Spiritual warfare" is:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. A vain imagination|B. A supernatural battle|C. A natural battle|D. A social condition|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 5. The spiritual battle was originally started:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. On earth|B. By God|C. In Heaven|D. All of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 6. The basic reason behind great spiritual conflict is:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Unknown|B. Man|C. God|D. Sin|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 7. The basic principle for understanding spiritual warfare is:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Natural battles of life have spiritual causes|B. All problems are from God|C. All problems originate with man|D. All problems are from Satan|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 8. "Repentance" is:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. An inward decision|B. Turning towards God|C. A change of mind|D. All of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 9. Repentance is important:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Because God commands it|B. In order to escape purgatory|C. Because church membership requires it|D. All of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 10. "Conversion" is:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. The same as repentance|B. To turn from the wrong way to the right way|C. The same as self-improvement|D. All of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 11. "Justification" means:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. An inward decision|B. Self-improvement|C. Right standing before God|D. All of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 12. "To be saved" means:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. The same as self-improvement|B. To be delivered from problems|C. To be delivered from a life in sin|D. All of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 13. The special function of God in the realm of spiritual warfare is:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Commander of the spiritual forces of good|B. Intercession for believers|C. Guiding the warfare by revelation|D. None of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 14. The function of Jesus Christ in spiritual warfare is:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Commander of the spiritual forces of good|B. Intercession for believers|C. Guiding the warfare by revelation|D. None of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 15. The function of the Holy Spirit in spiritual warfare is:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Commander of the spiritual forces of good|B. Intercession for believers|C. Guiding the warfare by revelation|D. None of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 16. The name of God to use when entering into spiritual warfare is:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. The Lord of hosts|B. The Lord provides|C. The Lord my sanctifier|D. The Lord my healer|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 17. The realms in which good angels minister are:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Heaven and earth|B. Heaven and Hell|C. Earth and purgatory|D. All of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 18. An attribute of angels is that they are:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Mortal|B. Powerful|C. Male|D. Female|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 19. Angels are:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Ministering spirits|B. Messengers|C. Both of these|D. Neither of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 20. Lucifer, now known as Satan, was created by:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Demonic forces|B. Evolution|C. God|D. The false prophet|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 21. Satan's former position was:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. A demon|B. Part of the Trinity|C. Unknown|D. An angel of God|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 22. Satan's fall was caused by:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Sin|B. God|C. Man|D. The world|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 23. Satan's sphere of activity is in:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Heaven only|B. Hell only|C. Earth|D. Hades|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 24. An activity of Satan is:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Deceit|B. Discouragement|C. Deception|D. All of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 25. Demons originated:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. When Satan fell|B. Through evolution|C. When Satan created them|D. When man sinned|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 26. The sphere of activity of demons is:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Heaven|B. Purgatory|C. Earth|D. All of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 27. An activity of demons includes:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Deception|B. False doctrines|C. Wickedness|D. All of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 28. An attribute of demons includes:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Supernatural strength|B. Omnipresence|C. Omnipotence|D. All of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 29. Originally demons were:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Men|B. Part of the Trinity|C. Angels of Satan|D. Angels of God|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 30. The word "flesh" as it is used in this course means:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. The basic sin nature|B. Willful defiance against God|C. Compulsive inner force|D. All of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 31. The word "world" as it is used in this course means:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. The planet|B. The same as "flesh"|C. The present condition of human affairs in opposition to God|D. Geographic boundaries|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 32. The "prince of this world" is:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Satan|B. Jesus|C. God|D. The Holy Spirit|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 33. The reason for the sinful condition of the current world system is:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Poverty|B. Sin|C. Lack of education|D. Lack of natural resources|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 34. The attitude of the world toward believers is one of:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Hatred|B. Acceptance|C. Love|D. Appreciation|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 35. "Lust" means:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Strong evil desires|B. Strong good desires|C. Hope|D. The same as love|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 36. Lust may be fostered by:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Sight and smell|B. Touch and taste|C. Hearing|D. All of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 37. If you do not control lust it results in:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Evil thoughts|B. Temptation|C. Sin|D. All of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 38. The works of the flesh are described in:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Ephesians 5:1-3|B. Galatians 5:19-21|C. Romans 1:3-6|D. I Corinthians 3:2-6|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 39. The strategy of the enemy in relation to God is:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. To oppose activities of God|B. To oppose the nature of God|C. To become like God|D. All of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 40. The strategy of the enemy in relation to nations is to:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Deceive the nations|B. Ignore the nations|C. Accuse the nations|D. All of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 41. The strategy of the enemy in relation to believers is to attack:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. The Word of God|B. Their worship|C. Their walk and work for God|D. All of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 42. Defensive warfare:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Responds to protect territory|B. Initiates aggressive action|C. Both of these|D. Neither of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 43. Offensive warfare:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Responds to protect territory|B. Initiates aggressive action|C. Both of these|D. Neither of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 44. According to the Scriptures, you should pray for:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Laborers for the harvest|B. Peace in Jerusalem|C. Leaders|D. All of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 45. A hindrance to answered prayer is:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Unbelief|B. Satanic hindrances|C. Unforgiveness|D. All of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 46. A purpose of fasting is to:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Humble yourself|B. Break bondages|C. Repent|D. All of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 47. "Devices" means:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. A scheme|B. A plan|C. A plot|D. All of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 48. New age teachings are:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Unscriptural|B. Scriptural|C. Not very common|D. Unknown|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 49. Transference of spirits means:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Demons are sharing spirits|B. You put a curse on someone|C. To come under the influence of another stronger spirit|D. You are involved in Satan worship|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 50. Identify the following as either a spiritual force of good or a spiritual force of evil: Good angels
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. A spiritual force of good.|B. A spiritual force of evil.|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 51. Identify the following as either a spiritual force of good or a spiritual force of evil: Bad angels
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. A spiritual force of good.|B. A spiritual force of evil.|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 52. Identify the following as either a spiritual force of good or a spiritual force of evil: Demons
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. A spiritual force of good.|B. A spiritual force of evil.|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 53. Identify the following as either a spiritual force of good or a spiritual force of evil: Satan
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. A spiritual force of good.|B. A spiritual force of evil.|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 54. Identify the following as either a spiritual force of good or a spiritual force of evil: God
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. A spiritual force of good.|B. A spiritual force of evil.|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 55. Identify the following as either a spiritual force of good or a spiritual force of evil: All unbelievers
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. A spiritual force of good.|B. A spiritual force of evil.|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 56. Identify the following as either a spiritual force of good or a spiritual force of evil: Jesus
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. A spiritual force of good.|B. A spiritual force of evil.|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 57. Identify the following as either a spiritual force of good or a spiritual force of evil: The Holy Spirit
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. A spiritual force of good.|B. A spiritual force of evil.|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 58. Identify the following as either a spiritual force of good or a spiritual force of evil: All born again believers
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. A spiritual force of good.|B. A spiritual force of evil.|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 59. Match the attributes of the Triune God in List One with the correct definitions in List Two: Eternal
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. No beginning or end|B. Present everywhere|C. Sinless|D. Highest, supreme power|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 60. Match the attributes of the Triune God in List One with the correct definitions in List Two: Sovereign
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. No beginning or end|B. Present everywhere|C. Sinless|D. Highest, supreme power|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 61. Match the attributes of the Triune God in List One with the correct definitions in List Two: Omnipresent
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. No beginning or end|B. Present everywhere|C. Sinless|D. Highest, supreme power|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 62. Match the attributes of the Triune God in List One with the correct definitions in List Two: Holy
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. No beginning or end|B. Present everywhere|C. Sinless|D. Highest, supreme power|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 63. Match the attributes of the Triune God in List One with the correct definitions in List Two: Infinite
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Does not change|B. Good and kind|C. Without flesh and blood|D. Not subject to natural limitations|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 64. Match the attributes of the Triune God in List One with the correct definitions in List Two: Unchanging
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Does not change|B. Good and kind|C. Without flesh and blood|D. Not subject to natural limitations|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 65. Match the attributes of the Triune God in List One with the correct definitions in List Two: Benevolent
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Does not change|B. Good and kind|C. Without flesh and blood|D. Not subject to natural limitations|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 66. Match the attributes of the Triune God in List One with the correct definitions in List Two: A spirit
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Does not change|B. Good and kind|C. Without flesh and blood|D. Not subject to natural limitations|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 67. Match the attributes of the Triune God in List One with the correct definitions in List Two: Omniscient
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. All powerful|B. Fair and impartial in judgment|C. Shows mercy to sinful mankind|D. Knows all things|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 68. Match the attributes of the Triune God in List One with the correct definitions in List Two: Omnipotent
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. All powerful|B. Fair and impartial in judgment|C. Shows mercy to sinful mankind|D. Knows all things|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 69. Match the attributes of the Triune God in List One with the correct definitions in List Two: Just
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. All powerful|B. Fair and impartial in judgment|C. Shows mercy to sinful mankind|D. Knows all things|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 70. Match the attributes of the Triune God in List One with the correct definitions in List Two: Merciful
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. All powerful|B. Fair and impartial in judgment|C. Shows mercy to sinful mankind|D. Knows all things|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 71. Match the type of warfare in List One with the correction definition in List Two: Frontal attack
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Invades an area|B. Controlling access to an area|C. Direct assaults|D. Hospitalization|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 72. Match the type of warfare in List One with the correction definition in List Two: Siege or blockade
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Invades an area|B. Controlling access to an area|C. Direct assaults|D. Hospitalization|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 73. Match the type of warfare in List One with the correction definition in List Two: Invasion and occupation
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Invades an area|B. Controlling access to an area|C. Direct assaults|D. Hospitalization|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 74. Match each category of angels to the correct definition: Only one reference is made to this group of angels (I Timothy 5:21).
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Messengers|B. Elect angels|C. Cherubim|D. Seraphim|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 75. Match each category of angels to the correct definition: This group of angels is most active in terms of spiritual warfare.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Messengers|B. Elect angels|C. Cherubim|D. Seraphim|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 76. Match each category of angels to the correct definition: This group of angels appear to be the highest order of angels.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Messengers|B. Elect angels|C. Cherubim|D. Seraphim|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 77. Match each category of angels to the correct definition: Their position is above the throne of God. They lead Heaven in worship of God.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Messengers|B. Elect angels|C. Cherubim|D. Seraphim|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 78. Match each demonic rank to the correct definition: Principalities
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Rule territories|B. At work in social, political, and cultural systems|C. Religious structures|D. Luciferian|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 79. Match each demonic rank to the correct definition: Powers and rulers of darkness
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Rule territories|B. At work in social, political, and cultural systems|C. Religious structures|D. Luciferian|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 80. Match each demonic rank to the correct definition: Spiritual wickedness in high places
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Rule territories|B. At work in social, political, and cultural systems|C. Religious structures|D. Luciferian|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 81. You are not to worship angels.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. True|B. False|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 82. If an angel reveals something contrary to God's written Word you should believe it.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. True|B. False|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 83. God has an organizational plan for his angels.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. True|B. False|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 84. Satan's angels are not organized.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. True|B. False|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 85. If you ignore Satan he will leave you alone.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. True|B. False|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 86. You can be neutral in spiritual warfare.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. True|B. False|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 87. All angels were originally created by God.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. True|B. False|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 88. Satan is omniscient.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. True|B. False|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 89. Satan is omnipotent.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. True|B. False|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 90. There is a time not to pray, when God requires action.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. True|B. False|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 91. Jesus has defeated Satan but the enemy is still "at large" in the world.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. True|B. False|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 92. You can recover yourself from the snare of the enemy.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. True|B. False|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 93. You should never "try " the spirits because that would be judging which is wrong.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. True|B. False|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 94. Once you are a believer you will not experience tribulation in the world.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. True|B. False|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 95. Victory over financial attacks can be gained by using scriptural principles.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. True|B. False|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 96. The condition of the present world is good and getting better.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. True|B. False|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 97. You do not have power over all the power of the enemy.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. True|B. False|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 98. Spiritual armor is not specifically identified in Scripture.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. True|B. False|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 99. I completed reading the text for this course..
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. True|B. False|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 100. I completed the self-tests at the end of each chapter.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. True|B. False|
